item.title: OpenBSD Dedicated Dotfiles
item.author: Author
item.description: OpenBSD as new OS So I started using OpenBSD in start of 2021. My blog readers know I keep my dotfiles on Github/Gitlab. Most of the programs I have been using in past were okay with this change. But I had to configure many things. New Dotfiles I created a new directory dot in my home dir. And cherry picked some of my old dots. But still that wasn’t enough. It took me 2 months to figure things out as per my liking.
